html_article_home:
ZERONE oversale pre-sale is coming soon:

The ZERONE oversale pre-sale community vault totals 55 million ZRO platform governance tokens, which will be circulated in six vaults, each with a different single coin price for ZRO, and the second vault will be automatically opened after the first vault is purchased until all six vaults are purchased. The USDT from the pre-sale of ZRO will be used to add to the LP pool for spot circulation, which will be launched at the same time as the ZERONE product.
The community vault will be opened soon, and we will witness the value-added phase of the ZRO platform governance tokens:
  • Vault I: 5 million pieces, 0.006U/pc
  • Vault II: 10 million pieces, 0.0065U/pc
  • Vault III: 10 million pieces, 0.007U/pc
  • Vault IV: 10 million pieces, 0.0075U/pc
  • Vault V: 10 million pieces, 0.008U/pc
  • Vault 6: 10 million pieces, 0.0085U/pc
Stay tuned for ZERONE a decentralized hybrid contract trading protocol, which is expected to be available to everyone in April/May, one that solves all project parties' Token and BTC/ETH contract trading problems.
notice_list_1: The community vault will be opened soon, and we will witness the value-added phase of ZRO platform governance tokens.
notice_list_2: The community vault totals 55 million ZRO platform governance tokens, which will be circulated in six vaults.
notice_list_3: Stay tuned for the ZERONE hybrid contract trading protocol will be available to everyone in April-May.
